content:
In the DAF profiles I found Element.id populated in a rather structured manner. Did the DAF people create any conventions around populating such ids and what was the primary purpose behind the decision?
We are thinking of leveraging Element.ids too for binding purposes, and would like to know whether or not we can count on them being present in all DAF profiles moving forward.

Because I feel the issue is broad enough I've created a task for this too: http://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=10256
@Alexander Henket - follow ups in Conformance stream
